title: Two out of five
creator_credit: Francine Vande Wiele, Jean Calvell and Unesco
brief_description: Two out of five of the world’s population cannot read or write, and the campaign to promote literacy is of great importance for economic and social development. Scenes in African and Asian countries illustrate the great efforts being made in many underdeveloped areas.
creator_credit_for_label: Francine Vande Wiele, Jean Calvell and Unesco
